title: User sees correct opening day MLS on a Contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user opens a Major Contract of any state
custom_steps: AND views the Opening Day MLS field
custom_expected:
THEN the player's Opening Day MLS for the year in which the contract was signed should be displayed. 
AND this should use the Opening Day of the current calendar year's MLS. If the season has not yet started, this will just be equal to the player's Current MLS.

title: User sees correct Confirmed Terms MLS on a Contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user opens a MJ contract of any state or is creating a new MJ Contract
custom_steps: AND views the Confirmed Terms MLS field
custom_expected:
THEN the player's Confirmed Terms MLS should be displayed. 
AND this should use the player's service as of the date entered in the "Confirmed Terms Date" field on the contract. 
AND If the field is not yet populated, the field should display as blank.

title: User sees correct Signing MLS on a contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a MJ contract in any state, or is creating a new MJ Contract
custom_steps: WHEN viewing the Signing MLS field
custom_expected:
THEN the player's Signing MLS should be displayed 
AND This should use the player's service as of the date entered in the "Signed Date" field on the contract. 
AND If this field is not yet populated, the field should display as blank.

title: Track updates made to a player's agent and agency information on their profile
custom_steps: WHEN a user makes updates to a player's agent or agency information on their profile
custom_expected:
THEN the system should maintain a log of the change, as well as the previous values 
AND the tracking should include any updates made to a player's agent or agency info by the system 
AND IT should be able to generate a consumable list of agents and agencies that represented a player along with the times they represented the player if it is requested

title: User can advance search for MJ Language
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has MJ Contract Language Permissions 
AND has navigated to Advanced Search
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects MJ Contract Language 
AND adds filters 
AND clicks search
custom_expected:
THEN the default filter will be "Language Phrase" 
AND user should see results based on entered filters 
AND the columns returned in the results set match the MJ Contract adv search columns 
AND the results set includes every contract that matches the entered filters that the user has permission to view (Club users will not see results of another Club's Preliminary or Terms Submitted Contract)

title: As a user I want to view an Employee Profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing an Employee in advanced search or on the Roster Widget
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks on the Employee name
custom_expected:
THEN the profile will load 
AND match the wireframe http://11yn8p.axshare.com/#p=info
AND only the info tab will display

title: Create MJ Contract for an Employee
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing an Employee profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Create New Major Contract
custom_expected:
THEN a Preliminary Major Contract will load 
AND the MJC will be able to successfully create, submit, and approve the contract

title: Users only see Contracts option in create new for Employees
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing and employee profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks create new icon
custom_expected: THEN only the Contracts option will display in create new

title: Create new does not appear on roster widget for employees
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the roster widget
custom_steps: WHEN they user sees employees on the roster widget
custom_expected: THEN the create new icon will not appear
